评论详情: I love this kimono; it is soft and one skin. The material is thin but still a good silky material. I was not sure if it would fit properly since it's a one size fits all and I'm more on the plus side, but it fit perfectly and is super comfortable. Very pleased with it.
It looks exactly like the photos and the material is so soft and silky. It's a gorgeous lounging robe and will fit generously most body types. It's feminine yet not too "girly" and is sexy too!
